alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:01PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Baker and north central Malheur Counties through 330 PM MDT/230 PM PDT/... At 300 PM MDT/200 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Malheur City, or 24 miles southeast of Baker City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rye Valley around 210 PM PDT. Durkee, Weatherby and Dixie around 220 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
